name: UpdateProductInCatalog
description:
Update an existing product in the catalog.

Use this tool to modify details of a product in the product catalog. Call this when a product's information needs to be updated.

parameters.name: product_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier for the product to be updated in the catalog.

parameters.name: product_id_number
parameters.description: Unique ID of the product to be updated in the catalog.

parameters.name: product_name
parameters.description: The name of the product to be updated in the catalog.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the asset type of the product. It should be an integer.

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: product_manufacturer_name
parameters.description: The name of the product's manufacturer. Provide as free text.

parameters.name: product_status
parameters.description: Specify the status of the product: `1` for In Production, `2` for In Pipeline, `3` for Retired.

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: procurement_mode
parameters.description: Specifies the mode of procurement: 1 for Buy, 2 for Lease, 3 for Both.

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: depreciation_type_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the type of depreciation used for the product.

parameters.name: depreciation_type_description
parameters.description: A description of the depreciation type used for the product. Accepts textual information detailing the depreciation category or specifics.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: Asset Type id of the Product

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: mode_of_procurement_id
parameters.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used
